title: Stage Lv9-P3-S19
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: In conclusion, we achieved our goals.
To summarize, our plan is feasible.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: In conclusion, we achieved our goals.
To summarize, our plan is feasible.

sentences.kr: 전체적으로 볼 때, 결과는 예상을 초과합니다.

sentences.en: In summary, all indicators have improved.
In conclusion, our strategy has proven effective.

sentences.kr: 전체적으로 평가해 보면, 이는 긍정적인 발전입니다.
sentences.en: Overall assessment shows this is a positive development.
To summarize, all conditions have been met.
